short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract all the defined classes to the clipboard and paste it anywhere as you wish.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple utility for frontend developers to get all the classes copied to clipboard for further creating the styles for them.
